titles.title: Small Business Size Standard Manufacturing Clarification Act of 2019
To amend the Small Business Act to modify the timeframe for determining the size standard for manufacturing small business concerns.
Small Business Size Standard Manufacturing Clarification Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Small Business Size Standard Manufacturing Clarification Act of 2019
This bill extends the period of time (from one year to five years) for which a manufacturing concern's average employment is to be considered for a determination of whether the manufacturer is a small business.
